headline: Nasdaq Announces End-of-Month Open Short Interest Positions in Nasdaq Stocks as of Settlement Date March 31, 2025
summary: NEW YORK, April 09, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- At the end of the settlement date of March 31, 2025, short interest in 3,140 Nasdaq Global MarketSM securities totaled 13,072,444,217 shares compared with 13,066,514,117 shares in 3,124 Global Market issues reported for the prior settlement date of March 14, 2025. The mid-March short interest represents 2.64 days compared with 2.14 days for the prior reporting period. Short interest in 1,625 securities on The Nasdaq Capital MarketSM totaled 2,682,510,

headline: Nasdaq (NasdaqGS:NDAQ) Experiences 11% Drop Over the Past Month
summary: Nasdaq (NasdaqGS:NDAQ) announced plans to expand its presence in Texas, establishing a new headquarters in Dallas to foster engagement with local financial entities. Meanwhile, the Nasdaq index experienced an 11% decline over the past month. This drop aligns with broader market trends, where heightened volatility was fueled by new tariffs and an intensifying trade war, overshadowing individual strategic expansions. While the market favored tech giants like Apple and Tesla amid volatile...
